name: about:blank - ArcticFox
description: This style adds a Firefox logo in the about:blank screen. This logo also appears in iframes during their loading, what is useful to notice them before they look like the page, or before adblock+ blocks them. I enhanced the style: http://userstyles.org/styles/3471/about-blank-arctic-firefox posted by iconolith. -I changed the picture format (from jpeg to png) enabling the transparency, then I uploaded it to three different image hosts. -I added the auto-sizing functionality (size auto-adapted to the container when this one is smaller than the image). These two features were lacking to iconolith's style: the image partially appeared in iframes, what wasn't fitted to be seen. By loxaxs Test it on the about:blank page.
